ROTARYENCODER2.D_ENCODER0: Settings for the first rotary encoder.
ROTARYENCODER2.D_ENCODER1: Settings for the second rotary encoder.
ROTARYENCODER2.D_ENCODER2: Settings for the third rotary encoder.
ROTARYENCODER2.D_ROTARYTYPE: Periods per tick (Full: A and B full period, half: A and B half period, quarter: A or B half period
ROTARYENCODER2.D_PINA: GPIO pin that is connected to the first pin of the rotary.
ROTARYENCODER2.D_PINB: GPIO pin that is connected to the second pin of the rotary.
ROTARYENCODER2.D_DIALACTION: Action to be triggered by turning the rotary encocer. Option 'Emit Websocket Message' can be used to control other plugins using the Volumio Websock calls between Plugins. (see https://volumio.github.io/docs/API/WebSocket_APIs.html section 'CallMethod on Plugin' for details)
ROTARYENCODER2.D_SOCKDATA: Data to include with the Websocket Command
ROTARYENCODER2.D_PINPUSH: GPIO pin that is connected to the pushbutton pin of the rotary. 0 or empty to disable.
ROTARYENCODER2.D_PINPUSHDEBOUNCE: Debounce time for the button. If the button has hardware-debouncing, set to 0.
ROTARYENCODER2.D_PUSHSTATE: Activate this, if pressing the button pulls the logic level on the GPIO low.
ROTARYENCODER2.D_PUSHACTION: Action that gets triggered, when pushbutton is pressed briefly.
ROTARYENCODER2.D_LONGPUSHACTION: Action that gets triggered, when pushbutton is pressed longer.
ROTARYENCODER2.D_LOGGING: Switch the output of log messages on or off. Error messages are always logged.
ROTARYENCODER2.TOAST_PINS_DIFFERENT: GPIO Pins for A/B/Button must be different.
ROTARYENCODER2.TOAST_PINS_BLOCKED: Pins already used in another Encoder.
